programme.title: Trio Chemirani
programme.desc: The veritable tombak virtuosos of Trio Chemirani, consisting of Chemirani Senior and Juniors, enrapture the Festival de Saintes. The tombak is a Persian percussion instrument, but its rhythms are universal. The Trio Chemiranis music is accessible to all and will certainly resound with each listener. The members of the trio, Djamchid Chemirani (born in Teheran in 1942) and his two sons and pupils Keyvan and Bijan, are living in France. Their concert performances bring them all over the world, as they explore the endless potential of their Persian percussion instruments. The trio finds also inspiration in Mediterranean modal music and jazz. These three musicians, who might well be thought of as poets are in search of a common language that connects several cultures.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: WOMEX 2018
programme.desc: Since 1994, World Music Expo (WOMEX) has been attracting musicians, agents, a great number of press agencies, as well as media companies from all over the world. Its main exposition event has been held in various locations throughout Europe, including Berlin, Brussels, Marseille, Stockholm, Seville, Cardiff, and Budapest. In 2018, WOMEX was held in Las Palmas, Gran Canaria. One of its showcase participants, Moonlight Benjamin, blends together Voodoo blues, Haitian rock and Creole roll into a riff-heavy, groove-laden sonic concoction built on the tension between her powerful voice and saturated electric guitars.

programme.title: Esplanada Music and Art in Concert
programme.desc: Esplanada was brought to life by Eddy Koopman, a long time Metropol Orkest member and composer. However, unlike other leading members in musical acts along the globe, Koopman does not put emphasis on himself. Most of the music he composes are for the Rotterdam Conservatory graduate violinist Sarah Koch. Blending various musical influences from both Western and Eastern parts of the world, Esplanada creates a zen-like atmosphere, which is further strengthened by the presence of Leontine Smit who is a visual artist.

programme.title: Coleman "Hank" Hawkins
programme.desc: Coleman Hawkins: Live in 62 presents two incredible concerts featuring stellar European and American legendary side-musicians including Harry "Sweets" Edison on trumpet and drummer "Papa" Jo Jones. Coleman Hawkins, "The Father of Jazz Saxophone," demonstrates why he is still considered one of the most important innovators in the history of jazz.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Archive
programme.desc: The world-renowned North Sea Jazz Festival features a wide variety of genres, including traditional New Orleans jazz, swing, bop, free jazz, fusion, avant-garde and electronic jazz, blues, gospel, funk, soul, RandB, hip hop, world beat and Latin. The festival was founded by entrepreneur and jazz fan Paul Acket, who sold his highly successful pop magazine publishing house to organize and fund the first edition of the festival in 1976. This broadcast from the North Sea Jazz Archives presents the great Wayne Shorter Quartet. Shorters maxim is to reinvent his music during each concert. He means to give his music a radical originality.

programme.title: John Coltrane
programme.desc: The mere mention of the name John Coltrane evokes a deeply emotional, often spiritual response from even the most casual jazz fan. Dexter Gordon was a fantastic saxophonist. Miles Davis was a genius. Coltrane stood above - he was a visionary, a saint-like figure. By the standards of most jazz musicians, his life was uneventful. Sure, he had a heroin habit for a while, and Miles Davis punched him, but once hed experienced the "spiritual awakening" described in the liner notes of his 1965 album A Love Supreme, he dedicated himself to his music with extreme single-mindedness. This broadcast of Coltranes 1965 performance at the short-lived Belgian jazz festival in Comblain-la-Tour features Tranes classic quartet with Elvin Jones (drums), Jimmy Garrison (bass) and McCoy Tyner (piano).

programme.title: Live at Studio de lErmitage, Paris
programme.desc: Five-piece contemporary jazz band Theorem of Joy released their first, self-titled album in April 2018 following three years of intense touring. During June 2018s celebratory album release party at Studio de lErmitage in Paris, Ellinoa (vocals), Thomas Julienne (bass), Thomas St. Laurent (guitar), Boris Lamerand (violin and alto saxophone), and Tom Peyron (drums) perform repertoire from their album. Adding luster to this special occasion is Les enfants dIcare: this French string quartet of Boris Lamerand and Antoine Delprat (violin), Olive Perusson (viola), and Octavio Angarita (cello) is no stranger to jazz. Moreover, special guests Maxime Berton (soprano saxophone) and Emilie Calme (flute and bansuri) contribute generously to this intimate, yet oh-so surprising performance. Enjoy Theorem of Joys vibrant mix of rock, free-jazz and pop live at Studio de lErmitage in Paris!

programme.title: Seine Sessions
programme.desc: The term "jam-session" was born in the 1920s, when black and white musicians gathered in smoke-filled bars after their respective concerts to enjoy the kind of jazz they could not play in traditional sets. Bing Crosby was a regular at these sessions, and had fun marking the first and third beats of musical phrases by clapping hands, which the musicians call "jammin the beat". Today, the Seine Sessions revive the happy years of "jam sessions", while the cream of jazz, blues, gipsy and funk Parisian scenes occurs on the boards of the legendary restaurant and jazz club Le Reservoir. Entitled "World Music", this episode hosted by Eddy King features unique performances by artists playing together for the first time, and interviews with Teofilo Chantre, Tiwitine, Kinsy Ray, and many others.

programme.title: The Morgenland Festival
programme.sub-title: The Morgenland Festival: I Will Not Be Sad
programme.desc: Since 2005, the Morgenland Festival, held in Osnabrueck, has dedicated itself to the fascinating music culture of the Near and Middle East. From traditional and classical music to avant-garde, jazz, and rock, the festival program also features art, such as visual arts, dance, and theatre of interdisciplinary projects. Jivan Gasparyan Jr has always been inspired by the folk melodies of his native Armenia. His grandfather, also a musician, taught him the art of duduk, an instrument of Armenian origin.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Thomas Carbou
programme.desc: Thomas Carbou and Patrick Graham share an almost telepathic rapport, blending spontaneous improvisation, electronic looping, and Brazilian and Indian musical influences to create ecstatic groove pieces and dream-like soundscapes. They use a wide array of instruments, including a custom-built 8-string guitar, cuatro, bouzouki, cajon, frame drums, berimbau, udu, and metal percussion instruments, as well as samplers and laptops, adding their own hypnotic vocals to the mix. This concert was recorded at Montreals Le Bleury Vinyl Bar, near the Place des Festivals, known worldwide as the venue for the Montreal International Jazz Festival.

programme.title: Fay Claassen
programme.sub-title: Fay Claassen: Two Portraits of Chet Baker
programme.desc: In 2013 it is 25 years ago that singer and trumpet player Chet Baker mysteriously died, caused by a fall from the window of his hotel room in Amsterdam. His music is more popular than ever. This concert is performed by Fay Claassen, who became internationally known through her album Two Portraits of Chet Baker. In the U.S. this album was the Best Vocal Album of the Year. In this concert Fay Claassen brings a tribute to Baker with the most beautiful songs and improvisations.

programme.title: Face au public
programme.desc: No early breakthrough rock and roll artist is more important to the development of the genre than Chuck Berry (1926-2017). Influenced by jazz and rhythm and blues, he was rock and rolls greatest songwriter, the main shaper of its instrumental voice, one of its greatest guitarists, and one of its greatest performers. In this 1965 Face au Public TV episode, Chuck Berry plays a string of hit songs, including his 1956 smash hit "Roll Over Beethoven", "Promised Land" and "Johnny B. Goode". Chuck cuts loose on guitar and the conservative crowd finally gets it.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Bayerischer Hof Night Club
programme.sub-title: Bayerischer Hof Night Club: Gonzalo Rubalcaba Trio
programme.desc: The Cuban pianist, composer and bandleader Gonzalo Rubalcaba is a star name on todays international jazz scene. Technically dazzling and brilliantly creative, Rubalcaba generates infectious excitement with his music. He says he uses jazz as a reference, but takes in the Cuban and African background which was itself an important influence on jazz musicians in the US. This live recording was made during the Munich Klaviersommer at the Bayerischer Hof Night Club, and includes well-known standards played Rubalcaba-style, as well as the pianists own compositions. He plays with Jeff Chambers (double bass) and Ignacio Berroa (drums).

programme.title: The Crusaders
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. The Crusaders, an American jazz fusion group that was popular in the 70s employed a two-manned front-line horn section. The groups sound was rooted in hard bop, with an emphasis on RandB and soul. Their performance at Estival is beyond soulful and an amazing show to watch.

programme.title: Tribute to Django Reinhardt
programme.sub-title: Tribute to Django Reinhardt: Bireli Lagrene
programme.desc: Bireli Lagrène is a French jazz guitarist born on September 4, 1966 in a family of gypsy tradition. His brother and his father introduced him from an early age to the repertoire of Django Reinhardt, whose influence is still felt in the style of Lagrène. In this performance, Lagrène pays homage to Django Reinhardt with his son, Babik Reinhardt.

programme.title: The making of Omara
programme.desc: Join us for an insightful look at the creative process of saxophonist Michael Blicher, organist Dan Hemmer, and drummer Steve Gadd as they craft the repertoire for their acclaimed 2016 album "Omara." Following in the footsteps of legendary organists like Jimmy Smith, Shirley Scott, and Jimmy McGriff, organist Dan Hemmer and his two musical peers prove that the organ trio format continues to be a force to be reckoned with in jazz and beyond. The album "Omara," recorded live during their 2016 tour of Germany, England and Denmark, captures the trios unique blend of jazz, soul, and blues in performance at some of Europes most intimate jazz clubs. Witness the passion, dedication, and inspiration that led to this wonderful album in Blicher Hemmer Gadd - The Making of "Omara".

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Mr. Phone Bone
programme.desc: The audience at the Montreal Jazz Festival in Canada was in for a treat on July 3, 1982, as a true musical innovator hit the stage: Jaco Pastorius, who transformed the electric bass into a formidable solo instrument. Combining intricate harmonics, fluid melodies, and unparalleled technical skill, Pastorius left a lasting impact on the music world. In this concert, he is accompanied by Peter Erskine (drums), Don Alias (percussion), Othello Molineaux (steel drums), Bob Mintzer (tenor sax and bass clarinet), and Randy Brecker (trumpet and electronics). They perform "Chicken", "Donna Lee", "Mr. Phone Bone", and "Fannie Mae". Dont miss this extraordinary opportunity to experience Jaco Pastoriuss electrifying performance at the Montreal Jazz Festival 1982!

programme.title: Jacques Kuba Seguin
programme.sub-title: Jacques Kuba Seguin: Letude des Lueurs
programme.desc: Trumpeter Jacques Kuba Seguins ensemble unites some of Montreals most expressive musicians: apart from Jacques Kuba Seguin, double bassist Frederic Alarie, pianist Jonathan Cayer, and drummer Kevin Warren deliver subtle but strong lyrical moments, that make it hard not to be touched by the musical bond of this group. The experience of their "Litania Projekt" seems to stop time for an instant. Together with his expressive musicians, Jacques presents a program that swings between modernity and tradition.

programme.title: On the Road With Duke Ellington
programme.sub-title: On the Road With Duke Ellington: I
programme.desc: In May 2014, the Conservatory of Amsterdam hosted a unique conference about one of the greatest jazz composers of the 20th century: Duke Ellington. Musicologists and musicians with a special bond with Ellington and his music spoke about his life and music. Among them were David Schiff, author of The Ellington Century, and Harvey Cohen, author of Duke Ellingtons America. Moreover, concerts were played by jazz pianist Matt Cooper, the Calefax Reed Quintet, and the Concert Big Band of the Conservatory of Amsterdam conducted by David Berger. The winner of the Boy Edgar Prize 2013, viola player Oene van Geel, performed his All Ellington Project.

programme.title: Kurhaus Scheveningen
programme.desc: The Dutch world-class jazz pianist Peter Beets has shared the stage with jazz greats like Chick Corea, Wynton Marsalis, "Toots" Thielemans, Elvin Jones, George Coleman, Johnny Griffin, Benny Golson and John Clayton. From birth, Beets was surrounded by music: he heard classical music from his mother, who is a music pedagogue, and he heard jazz from his father, who has a great fan of Oscar Peterson and Art Blakey. Although Beets parents originally did not associate the word "musician" with the word "career", music is definitely in the familys blood. At this concert at the Kurhaus in Scheveningen, the Netherlands, Peter Beets teams up with the world-famous guitarist Kurt Rosenwinkel. With a career spanning almost twenty-five years and including collaborating with dynamic peers like Brad Mehldau, Brian Blade, Mark Turner, Joshua Redman, Chris Potter, as well as esteemed jazz legends like Joe Henderson, Paul Motian and Gary Burton, Rosenwinkels indelible mark in music is the consummation of being steeped in the rich and deep traditions of jazz, springing off of the shoulders of such vital underpinnings to elevate his own art to new heights, evolving the language in a way no other guitarist has since his arrival. This collaboration between Beets and Rosenwinkel guarantees brilliant music.

programme.title: Jazz à Vienne
programme.desc: A number of spellbinding performances from Jazz à Vienne, a well-known Jazz Festival that takes place annually, in France. Every evening there are concerts in the ancient Roman theater of Vienne. Among the performers there have been musicians such as Miles Davis, Stan Getz, Michel Petrucciani, Ella Fitzgerald, and many more. In addition to the main concerts there are smaller ones on other stages in the city, and in pubs and musical moves.

programme.title: WOMEX 2018
programme.desc: Since 1994, World Music Expo (WOMEX) has been attracting musicians, agents, a great number of press agencies, as well as media companies from all over the world. Its main exposition event has been held in various locations throughout Europe, including Berlin, Brussels, Marseille, Stockholm, Seville, Cardiff, and Budapest. In 2018, WOMEX was held in Las Palmas, Gran Canaria. One of its showcase participants, Lucibela, comes from the island of Sao Nicolau. Her assured, warm voice is shaped by years of assimilation to the sounds of morna and coladeira.

programme.title: Art Blakey Live in 1965
programme.desc: Art Blakey: Live in 65 features what many consider to be one of the finest lineups in the history of jazz: Art Blakey (Drums), Bobby Timmons (Piano), Jymie Merritt (Bass), Benny Golson (Sax), and the legendary trumpet player, Lee Morgan. Lost for nearly 50 years, this historic 55-minute concert, filmed in Belgium in 1958 is the only known visual document of this influential band who were together for only six months.

programme.title: The MotorMusic Jazz Sessions
programme.desc: The MotorMusic Studios in Mechelen, Belgium, attract many great musicians to the city. A wide variety of visiting international jazz musicians share their art of making jazz music with the DJAZZ series Belgium Sessions. In these sessions, some of Europes finest musicians perform their own, original music. This episode presents Linus, a duo of two composers and improvisers: baritone guitar player Ruben Machtelinckx and tenor saxophonist Thomas Jillings. The intense sound produced by the tenor saxophone and the acoustic baritone guitar yields melodies that take you on a journey through a world of simplicity, purity, and longing.

programme.title: Quartet No. 2 Part 1
programme.desc: Many of pianist Chick Coreas compositions have become jazz standards. As a member of Miles Davis band in the late 1960s, he participated in the birth of the electric jazz fusion movement. In the 1970s, Corea founded the legendary jazz fusion group Return to Forever. Along with Herbie Hancock, McCoy Tyner and Keith Jarrett, Corea is one of the biggest modern jazz pianists. He continued musical collaborations with a diverse range of artists, exploring various musical styles. This broadcast features three performances that illustrate Chick Coreas many talents.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Live at the Metro Theatre
programme.desc: The Australian-born singer-songwriter Sia Kate Isobelle Furler, simply known as Sia, is one of the most unique artists in todays popular music scene. However, her path to stardom has been nothing but rocky. Only after numerous musical experimentations, where the singer tried to establish herself in her home country as well as United Kingdom, Sia finally blossomed in United States around the second decade of the 21st century. The very beginnings of her mainstream recognition was captured on 25 March 2009, where the artist performed live at Metro Theatre in Sydney, Australia.

programme.title: Les McCann
programme.sub-title: Les McCann: Live in New Orleans
programme.desc: Autodidact Les McCann became an international jazz star he is today after the release of his album "Swiss Movement" in 1968 which was recorded with Eddie Harris. However this musician has many other sides of achievements than that one record such as; McCann effortlessly switched between styles and stood his ground in every role from bop to fusion, from vocals to electric piano and clavinet to synthesizer, his is mix of church music and swing fits perfectly in the spirit of his time although at one point within the 90s he was only able to play with a single finger due to his illness. In todays broadcast, McCann brings gospel back to the New Orleans where this set was played in 1983. McCanns vocals triumph in the soulful performance of many of his hits, including Just Like Magic. He is accompanied by his fantastic "Magic Band" consisting of saxophonist Bobby Bryant Jr., bassist Curtis Roberson Jr. and drummer Tony St. James.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Recorda Me
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1982, the Superstar Quintet, which consists of the otherworldly American trumpeter Freddie Hubbard, saxophonist Joe Henderson, drummer Tony Williams, bassist Ron Carter, and pianist Kenny Baron performed at the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. The star-studded fivesome put on a concert of cosmic proportions.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Huu Bac Quintet Live in Canada 15
programme.desc: Huu Bac was two years old when he left Vietnam and moved to Quebec. His musical life started off with jazz guitar. Later Bac was introduced to the Vietnamese instrument "Dan Bau". This antique stringed instrument is central to Vietnamese folk music. Huu Bacs curiosity about old-fashioned instruments led him to the Shanghai Conservatory where he came across the Chinese violin "Erhu". Bacs music covers a traditional repertoire mixed with Western influences.

programme.title: Mondriaan Jazz 2017
programme.desc: Forq is an instrumental quartet with an aggressive sound and a penchant for sonic exploration. Originally founded by keyboardist Henry Hey (David Bowie, Empire of the Sun, and Jeff "Tain" Watts) and bassist Michael League (Grammy-winning founder of Snarky Puppy), Forq is joined by guitarist Chris McQueen and drummer Jason "JT" Thomas. Their group sound draws from various musical paths of its members, whether its Jasons swampy grooves and shuffles, Chris singular sonic approach to guitar, Henrys zeal for unique keyboard sounds and twisted ear candy, or Michaels driving world-influenced grooves. The band pushes further down the sonic rabbit hole with their stunning music. This concert was filmed during Mondriaan Jazz Festival 2017, The Hague.

programme.title: Rhoda Scott and La Velle
programme.sub-title: Rhoda Scott and La Velle: Hammond, Soul and Blues
programme.desc: American soul and jazz organist Rhoda Scott spent most of her career in France, where she earned recognition far greater than that accorded to her in the United States. There was never any doubt about what instrument she would play as a child. "Its really the most beautiful instrument in the world," she once stated in an interview. "The first thing I did was take my shoes off and work the pedals." This performance at the French Festival Jazz à Vienne is extra special. Not only because of the beautiful location, but also because she shares the stage with American gospel and blues singer La Velle. Together they give an intimate and beautiful show in the antique theatre of Vienne.

programme.title: Woody Hermans Swinging Herd live in England 1964
programme.desc: Woody Herman: Live in 64 features a blistering one-hour concert from 1964 showcasing one of the very hottest line-ups of the "Swinging Herd," including trumpeter Bill Chase, trombonist Phil Wilson, and the amazing saxophonist Sal Nistico on the front line, as well as drummer Jake Hanna, bassist Chuck Andrus, and pianist-arranger Nat Pierce in the rhythm section. The band roars throughout the entire show which includes standards such as "Lonesome Old Town", "After Youve Gone", and new originals including Charles Minguss "Better Git It In Your Soul."

programme.title: Aki Rissanen Trio at Jazzclub Unterfahrt, Munich
programme.desc: Aki Rissanens interest in jazz came after he started taking classical piano lessons. His deep interest in improvised music placed him among top jazz pianist in his home country - Finland. While composing and performing his own music, Rissanen has also collaborated with Verneri Pohjola and Dave Liebman, and today his name appears among the top European jazz musicians. Live from "Jazzclub Unterfahrt" in Munich, Germany, together with Antti Lotjonen on bass and Teppo Makynen on drums, Rissanen showcases the best of Scandinavian jazz and its DNA - the Nordic Tone.

programme.title: Great Jazz Pianists
programme.desc: Embark on a remarkable journey through the world of jazz piano as we showcase some of the most iconic and influential pianists in history. This collection of extraordinary performances captures the unique essence and brilliance of legendary pianists Art Tatum, Thelonious Monk, Bud Powell, and others. Revel in Oscar Petersons virtuosity as his trio plays "C-Jam Blues" in Holbaek, Denmark, on May 2, 1964. Let the sublime artistry of Art Tatum captivate you as he interprets Antonín Dvořáks "Humoresque" in 1953. Discover Thelonious Monks enigmatic genius as his quartet performs his iconic composition "Round About Midnight" in Poland on April 4, 1966. Experience the timeless appeal of the Dave Brubeck Quartets odd-metered "Take Five", recorded live in Brussels, Belgium, on October 10, 1964. Delight in the lyrical beauty of Bud Powells solo performance of "Sweet and Lovely" at the Antibes Jazz Festival of July 13, 1960. Witness the fusion of jazz and funk in Herbie Hancock and The Headhunters exhilarating studio performance of "Sly" in Bremen, Germany, recorded on November 6, 1974. Lastly, enjoy the soulful grooves of Horace Silvers "Song for my Father" performed by his quintet at the Umbria Jazz Festival of July 20, 1976. Tune in and let these legendary jazz pianists transport you on unforgettable musical adventures!

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Count Basie and his Orchestra live in Charleroi
programme.desc: Count Basie is one of the most important bandleaders of the swing era. With the exception of a brief period in the early 50s, he led a big band from 1935 until his death almost 50 years later. Basies orchestra was characterized by a light, swinging rhythm section that he led from the piano, lively ensemble work, and generous soloing. Basie was not a composer like Duke Ellington or an important soloist like Benny Goodman. His instrument was his band, which was considered the epitome of swing and deeply influenced jazz. In this 1961 concert recording, Count Basie takes the stage in Charleroi.

programme.title: Burton and Ozone - Munchner Klaviersommer
programme.desc: "Munchner Klaviersommer" was an annual concerts series that took place from 1981 to 1998 in Munich, Germany. Although the festivals name suggests a strong focus on piano music, it featured countless famous musicians from jazz and classical music - not just pianists. The concerts were usually held in July at The Gasteig, home of the Munich Philharmonic. In 1995, vibraphonist Gary Burton and pianist Makoto Ozone, both great jazz players noted for their virtuoso technique and innovative style, came together to give a concert of improvised music. They delighted the audience with their fluid, poetic artistry, which was expressed in a performance of the highest order.

programme.title: Ella Fitzgerald in Brussels
programme.sub-title: Ella Fitzgerald in Brussels: The American Songbook
programme.desc: Ella Fitzgerald: Live in "57" features "The First Lady Of Song" in a distinct performance. Its the earliest known complete concert of Ella to be captured on film. Shot in Belgium, this 1957 concert sees her performing with jazz greats Ray Brown, Herb Ellis, Jo Jones and the legendary Oscar Peterson on classics such as "Lullaby Of Birdland" and It Dont Mean A Thing (If It Aint Got That Swing). Although she wanted to be a dancer at first, Ella Fitzgerald already listened to recordings of Louis Armstrong, Bing Crosby and The Boswell Sisters at an early age. After her debut at an amateur talent show in 1934, Ella joined Chick Webbs Orchestra with which she recorded several hits; after Webb died, she became the leader of the orchestra. In the late 1940s, Ella Fitzgerald became known as the First Lady of Song, with her wide vocal range of three octaves. The American jazz singer was particularly appreciated for her pure tone, intonation and phrasing, and unparalleled improvisational abilities. In a career that spanned close to 60 years, Fitzgerald sold 40 million albums and won 13 Grammy Awards, mainly for her definitive interpretations of the Great American Songbook.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Sammy Price and the Harlem Beggars
programme.desc: Pianist, singer and civil rights activist Sammy Price is joined by the gospel singers known as the Harlem Beggars for spirited renditions of "Go Tell It on the Mountain," "Im a Soldier," and "When the Saints Go Marching In," among several others. The group is joined by Wilbert Harrison, who provides accompaniment on organ.

programme.title: PC Qwintett
programme.desc: Pierre Courbois has been one of Europes leading jazz musicians since the mid-sixties. This concert, recorded at the renowned Amsterdam jazz club Bimhuis, sees the drummer playing with his QWINTETT. On the occasion of his 75th birthday in 2015, Courbois hit the road for the Pierre Courbois 75 Years Anniversary Tour. The PC QWINTETT consists of several highly acclaimed Dutch jazz musicians with whom Courbois has worked before in his long and versatile career. Among them are pianist Nike Langenhuijsen, double bassist Egon Kracht, trumpeter Toon de Gouw, and trombonist Ilja Reijngoud. QWINTETT honours the Charles Mingus tradition of thematic and melodic ensemble jazz - but also with an unmistakable Courbois groove! Courbois, known for his own way of combining compositions with improvisations, melodically melts constructions with uneven breaks.

programme.title: North Sea Jazz Classics
programme.desc: The North Sea Jazz Festival is the largest indoor music festival in the world, known globally as the event where the past, present and future of jazz are featured within three days. Next to a firm base of jazz as the festivals staple music genre, many others, such as blues, soul, funk, or hip hop, pass by. In 1987, jazz saxophonist Branford Marsalis brought his band to the North Sea Jazz Festival in The Hague. This broadcast presents a selection of that performance, displaying the magical and mesmerising energy coming from the legendary saxophone virtuoso and member of the Marsalis jazz dynasty.

programme.title: Sabrina Starke - InJazz 2019
programme.desc: Jazz festival slash conference inJazz brings together the supply and demand sides of the Dutch jazz scene, helping artists share knowledge and experiences and stimulating the development of international relationships. The conference program includes inspiring panel discussions, workshops, networking sessions and presentations. During the night, promising Dutch jazz acts as well as more seasoned groups hit the stage to show what theyre capable of. One of the artists performing at inJazz is Sabrina Starke, a self-made, award-winning singer-songwriter, producer and self-empowerment ambassador. She has won an impressive number of prestigious awards for her soul-soothing music.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Baden Powell Quartet - Jazz Samba
programme.desc: Recorded in 1971 in Paris, France, Brazilian, classically trained bossa nova guitarist Baden Powell and his quartet play Pai, Lotus (written by Baden Powell), Tristeza (by Haroldo Lobo/Niltinho), Round Midnight (by Thelonious Monk), Nega do cabelo duro (by David Nasser/Rubens Soares), and Aos pes da cruz (by Ze da Zilda/Marino Pinto). Powell is joined by Ernesto Ribeiro-Gonçalves on double bass, Helio Schiavo on drums, and Alfredo Bessa on percussion.

programme.title: Michel Legrand Orchestra at Spa, 1982
programme.desc: Known outside jazz circles mainly for his film scores, French composer, arranger and pianist Michel Legrand has had a long and storied career in music. Interpreters of his compositions include jazz legends such as Sarah Vaughan, Stan Getz, and Bill Evans, as well as pop stars such as Barbra Streisand and Frank Sinatra. During this 1982 performance in the Belgian town of Spa, Legrand leads his orchestra through a number of original songs, including "The Summer Knows," "What Are You Doing the Rest of Your Life?" and "Les Moulins de mon Cœur." Singing either in English or French, Legrand delivers a spirited performance with plenty of romantic flair that is sure to capture your heart.

programme.title: Ray Charles
programme.desc: "The mournful expressiveness of his voice opens a window into the human heart, it is the sound of soul, a cosmic howl that cuts through emotional canvases like a hot knife through butter." These words of Yvonne Smith perfectly describe the incredible voice of Ray Charles. Charles, the man who combined blues, jazz, gospel and rhythm and blues creating the music that we now know as soul, can rightfully be called a genius. This documentary gives a unique overview of his turbulent life. Colleagues and contemporaries including David "Fathead" Newman, Dr. John, Billy Joel, Willie Nelson, Hank Crawford, Ahmet Ertegun, Jerry Wexler, Billy Preston, Merry Clayton and Ray Charles, Jr. share their first-hand experiences with Ray Charles.

programme.title: Brazilian NYE
programme.desc: The Da Pá Virada Sessions series presents the best musicians of contemporary Brazilian jazz, and beyond. Filmed in Sao Paulo, each session offers a unique experience by giving a fresh look into Brazils music scene. The artists for each session are selected in consultation with Stingray DJAZZs music editor. One of the artists taking part in this series is Paulo Novaes. Coming from a family of musicians, Paulo Novaes has already lived through a lifetime of music in spite of his young age. Paulo is the cousin of singer Bruna Caram, with whom he performed in Sao Paulo, Madrid, Barcelona, Lisbon, and other major cities. As a singer, composer, and instrumentalist, his creativity is enjoyed in many forms. With three albums out and his song "Perdoa" reaching over 20 million streams on Spotify, he steps into the spotlights time and time again. Now Da Pá Virada Sessions and Stingray present Paulo Novaes in this intimate performance, recorded in Novaes native city Sao Paulo.

programme.title: Jazzed Out Swiss
programme.desc: Jazzed Out proves that a jazz session can take place anywhere. Unusual locations, such as garage buildings, multi-storey car parks, street corners, subway trains, and parks, in several of the worlds metropoles, provide the setting for brief jazz performances. The sheer rawness of the metropoles merge with the musical creations of various artists in search of the perfect urban stage. In this episode, Zurich serves as a backdrop for sets by pianist Stefan Rusconi, Grand Pianoramax, and Nik Bartsch.

programme.title: Da Pá Virada Sessions
programme.desc: The Da Pá Virada Sessions series presents the best musicians of contemporary Brazilian jazz, and beyond. Filmed in Sao Paulo, each session offers a unique experience by giving a fresh look into Brazils music scene. The artists for each session are selected in consultation with Stingray DJAZZs music editor. One of the artists taking part in this episode is vocalist Mariana Aydar, who masters the música popular brasileira repertoire (MPB) like no other. She was born in a family of musicians, and has been dubbed the "hottest singer of the moment" by Veja, one of Brazils leading newsmagazines. For her performance at Da Pá Virada Sessions, Aydar (vocals and triangle) is joined by Cosme Vieira (accordion) and Feeh Silva (zabumba).

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Seine Sessions
programme.desc: The term "jam-session" was coined in the 1920s when black and white musicians gathered in smoke-filled bars after their respective concerts to enjoy the kind of jazz they could not play in traditional sets. Bing Crosby was a regular at these sessions, and had fun marking the first and third beats of musical phrases by clapping hands, which the musicians call "jammin the beat". Today, the Seine Sessions revive the happy years of "jam sessions", while the cream of jazz, blues, gipsy and funk Parisian scenes occurs on the boards of the legendary restaurant and jazz club Le Reservoir. Titled "Legendary Jazz", this episode hosted by Eddy King features unique performances by artists playing together for the first time, and interviews with Steve McCraven, Oona Guino, Rodolphe Lauretta, and many others.

programme.title: jazzahead! 2023 interview
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals give a good impression of the jazz world. Both famous and less famous jazz artists will give a new insight in their life. DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that special song, what was the first record they bought and what is his or her most precious musical memory. The festival portraits are beautiful reports filmed at the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the memory of the festival, the music and the experience.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals give a good impression of the jazz world. Both famous and less famous jazz artists will give a new insight in their life. DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that special song, what was the first record they bought and what is his or her most precious musical memory. The festival portraits are beautiful reports filmed at the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the memory of the festival, the music and the experience.

programme.title: Liberica Arrels
programme.desc: Having played in New York with jazz icons Dave Liebman, Eliot Zigmund, Ari Hoenig, and Chris Cheek, Catalan bass player Manel Fortià now returns to his roots to reinvent traditional Catalan repertoire. Manel Fortià teams up with Antonia Lizana (saxophones), Pere Martínez (vocals), Max Villavecchia (piano), and Raphael Pannier (drums) to form Liberica, reimagining Catalan music and Flamenco through the eyes of a New York jazz musician. Their 2021 album "Arrels" explores Catalan hymns, including "El cant dels ocells" and Els tres tambors, heard here during a live performance at Nova Jazz Cava in Barcelona.

programme.title: Belgium Sessions
programme.desc: In this DJAZZ Belgium Sessions performance, which was recorded at AED Studios in Lint, Belgium, we witness Europes finest jazz musicians at work. A wide variety of international jazz musicians give a creative, up-close and inside insight into their art of playing jazz music. Young talent and established jazz musicians play to their hearts content: take for instance this unusual performance by the multi-ethnic ensemble Hijaz. This band explores the dialogue between piano and the oud, a pear-shaped stringed instrument from the East. Hijaz is a close-knit quartet that explores the differences and similarities between Mediterranean cultures in order to create moments of harmony, warmth, and great musical beauty.

programme.title: DJAZZ Clips
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: Summer Night Music - Love Songs
programme.desc: In Summer Night Music - Love Songs, artists from all over the world contribute their favourite love songs to an unusual and exciting event uniting classical, jazz, and world music. Among the classical musicians are the Gewandhaus Orchestra, cellist Mischa Maisky, and The Kings Singers. Other world stars include jazz vocalist Dee Dee Bridgewater and flamenco cantaora Mayte Martin. The variety of musicians and genres appeals to a wide audience, aiming to create a grand open-air atmosphere that every music lover will remember.

programme.title: Django Reinhardt Tribute
programme.sub-title: Django Reinhardt Tribute: Beets and Rosenberg
programme.desc: The treasured compositions of guitarist Django Reinhardt, the founding father of hot club jazz, are engraved in everyones memory. Although Reinhardt missed two fingers of his left hand, his virtuoso technique was unrivalled. Dutch guitarist Stochelo Rosenberg and pianist Peter Beets now have the pleasure to bring Djangos music back to life with their infectious improvisations.

programme.title: TorTube
programme.sub-title: TorTube: Dual City Concert Band ft. Hermine Deurlo
programme.desc: Jazz fans in television land have come to the right place for their dose of first-rate world jazz: TorTube! Jazz club De Tor in Enschede is one of Europes most authentic jazz venues, with an absolutely unique ambiance. Some of the best musicians from Holland and the rest of the world find their way to De Tor to perform for an appreciative audience of jazz fans. Foot Together is a TorTube episode featuring Dutch jazz icon Hermine Deurloo on the chromatic harmonica, in collaboration with the Dual City Concert Band led by Rini Swinkels. The spirited big band plays swinging and powerful jazz, with the incredible Hermine Deurloo adding a touch of Toots Thielemans as she plays her Hohner Toots Mellow Tone mouth organ.

programme.title: Miriam Makeba Live at Estival Lugano 1985
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. Miriam Makeba, also named Mama Africa, was a South African singer, actress, United Nations goodwill ambassador, and civil-rights activist. Her career flourished in the US, where she released several albums. Makeba was among the first African musicians to receive worldwide recognition. She brought African music to a Western audience, and popularized the world music and Afropop genres. Her performances at Estival Lugano is beyond incredible. Her voice, the power and the soul summarizes her musicality in 40 minutes, together with her band and extremely talented backing-vocals.

programme.title: Munchner Klaviersommer
programme.desc: Theres no question about it: with a Grammy for Best Latin Jazz Album for her recording Made In Brazil, seven previous Grammy nominations, four Gold Disc Awards, and three "Best Vocal Album Awards" in Japan, Eliane Elias has taken her place in the pantheon of music giants. In her projects, Elias wears many hats: she serves as producer, composer, lyricist, arranger, pianist, and vocalist. In this concert broadcast, recorded live at the Philharmonie in Munich, Elias shows her distinctive and immediately recognizable musical style, which blends her Brazilian samba roots and her sensuous, alluring voice with her impressive instrumental bebop, jazz, classical, and compositional skills. She is an artist beyond category, and in this concert she performs with Jay Randall Anderson (bass) and Adam Nussbaum (drums).

programme.title: Jazzahead!
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts at the worlds largest jazz event. In 2022, jazzahead! paid special attention to Canadas jazz scene and invited forty jazz acts from all over the world to perform over the course of three days. Among the performing bands is the François Bourassa Quartet. With ten albums of original music and multiple awards, jazz pianist François Bourassa is an international ambassador for Canadas thriving jazz community. Taking inspiration from a diversity of sources, this award-winning quartet has been a staple of Montreals artistic landscape for a quarter of a century. The band features bassist Guy Boisvert, saxophonist Andre Leroux and drummer Guillaume Pilote.

programme.title: Jazzahead!
programme.desc: Annual trade fair, exhibition, and festival jazzahead! is one of the international jazz communitys most important events. Hosted in Bremen, Germany, jazzahead! brings together musicians, bookers, agents, organizers, jazz experts, and music enthusiasts at the worlds largest jazz event. In 2022, jazzahead! paid special attention to Canadas jazz scene and invited forty jazz acts from all over the world to perform over the course of three days. One of the bands taking the stage at jazzahead! 2022 is the trio of Scottish pianist-composer Fergus McCreadie. Upon his graduation from the Royal Conservatoire of Scotland in 2018, McCreadie immediately made an impact on the European scene, playing jazz reflecting Scotlands landscape and musical traditions as well as American and Scandinavian influences. Ferguss second album "Forest Floor" puts him onto the world stage. Fergus McCreadie appears alongside double bassist David Bowden and drummer Stephen Henderson.

programme.title: Teus Nobel live at the Bimhuis
programme.sub-title: Teus Nobel live at the Bimhuis: Legacy
programme.desc: Teus Nobel is a Dutch trumpet and flugelhorn player. As a little boy, he was inspired by "power" trumpeters such as Maynard Ferguson and Bill Chase. While studying at the conservatory, he played both as jazz player and as a commercial session musician at musicals. After his time at the conservatory, he started playing in the Royal Netherlands Air Force Orchestra, playing march music influenced by pop and jazz. Todays broadcast was recorded at the Amsterdam BIMhuis. Teus dedicates his compositions to his all-time heroes Jarmo Hoogendijk, Woody Shaw, Christian Scott, Roy Hargrove and Eric Vloeimans. This performance is based on his second album Legacy.

programme.title: Wes Montgomery - Nicas Dream
programme.desc: This selection of unforgettable performances by some of the most iconic and influential jazz guitarists in history showcases these legends unique essence. Revel in Wes Montgomerys virtuosity as he performs the captivating "Nicas Dream" in Holland in 1965, and delight in the expressive beauty of his rendition of "Heres That Rainy Day", recorded in London in that same year. Experience the timeless appeal of Joe Passs "You Stepped Out of a Dream" and "You Turned The Tables on Me", recorded live in Hanover in 1975. The interplay between Jim Hall and Atilla Zoller borders on the impossible as they perform "Extensions" in Hanover in 1973. Enjoy Jim Halls lyrical solo performance of "Im Getting Sentimental Over You" from 1964. Witness Sonny Sharrocks avant-garde fusion of jazz and rock in an exhilarating performance of "Peanut", recorded live in France in 1970. Sharrock is joined by flutist Herbie Mann in a soulful performance of "Memphis Underground" from 1969. Immerse yourself in the magic of jazz guitar!

programme.title: DJAZZ Portrait
programme.desc: These portraits of artists, concerts and festivals provide a good picture of the jazz world. They are portraits of well-known and less known jazz artists who give us an insight into their lives amongst other things, DJAZZ asked them why they wrote that particular song, what was the first record this musician bought and what his or her most cherished musical memory is. The festival portraits are beautiful reports of the most special jazz festivals and concerts. They revive the festival with the music and experience.

programme.title: George Shearing Duo feat. Neil Swainson
programme.desc: British pianist George Shearing enjoyed an international reputation as an instrumentalist, arranger, and composer. Equally at home on the classical concert stage as in jazz clubs, he was recognized for his inventive, orchestrated jazz. In this live recording from the Munich Philharmonie, Shearing played in a duo format with Canadian double bassist Neil Swainson. The repertoire consisted of a selection of compositions by Shearing himself, among them Lullaby Of Birdland, which is a standard in jazz repertoire.

programme.title: Midwichi kaod
programme.desc: Parast suuremat verevalamist plaanivad lapsed lahkuda. Susannah laheb nendega vabatahtlikult kaasa ja puuab Cassie ohutusse kohta viia. Nuud on selge, et nad tuleb peatada. Ja lihtsat valjapaasu pole.

programme.title: CSI
programme.desc: Miami CSI meeskonda juhib pommiekspert Horatio Caine. Temaga koos teostavad uurimisi ballistik ja relvaekspert Calleigh Duquesne ja raamatukoi Tim Speedle, kes tunneb Miami tanavaid nagu oma taskuid. Lisaks aitavad neid DNA spetsialist Alexx Woods ja sukelduja Eric Delko. See viisik toob alati tõe kuritegude kohta paevavalgele.

programme.desc: Rikkur Amanda Babbagei mõrva uuriv Monk kahtlustab Amanda venda Brianit, kuid tema teooriaga on uks pisike probleem - Brian on neljandat kuud koomas. Monk ei jata jonni ning asub ajusid ragistama, tõestamaks uurijatele, et ka koomas inimene on võimeline tapma.

programme.desc: Emily laheb raksu teismelise Addisoniga. Spencer tulitseb oma emaga. Aria puistab Holdenile sudant. Jenna keerutab taas tormi ules.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Saareliste suudlemisoskused pannakse proovile, kuid millised musid on siirad?

programme.title: Majajahtijad
programme.desc: Kihlatud paar tahab oma uhist elu alustada pulmade ja suure remondiga oma Los Angelese kodus.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Piret ei suuda otsustada, kuidas tekkinud abielukriis lahendada. Mari juurde ilmub ootamatu kulaline. Kertu paneb Pireti ebamugavasse olukorda. Sirje õpetab Mammule elutarkusi ja tekitab sellega paksu pahandust. Riina on Marile tanulik. Kertu ja Andres teevad pulmaplaane.

programme.title: Vana silla saladus
programme.desc: Isaacil on raske Elsat uskuda. Gonzalo tuleb Fernandolt raha nõudma. Tiburcio langetab otsuse.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud. Austraalia
programme.desc: Tsirkuseartist Dakota ja fotograaf Reece tunduvad teoorias ideaalse paarina, aga armastuses turvavõrke pole. Kaskadoor Corey kohtub põnevate seilkluste jahil oleva Tammyga. Topless-baaris tootav soakas Eva kohtub rahuliku loomuga Deaniga lootuses, et ta amet meest ara ei ehmata. Hella sudamega hiiglane Patrick kohtub lustaka Eriniga ning kohtinguteveteran Katie loodab, et Andrew on tema Harra Õige.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Levi on MacKenzie parast mures. Marilyni hirmud aina paisuvad. Kas Ari ja Abigail on jargmiseks sammuks valmis?

programme.title: Poissmees
programme.desc: Melbourneis asuvasse kaunisse Bridgetoni-stiilis haarberisse saabuvad meie kolm uut poissmeest Luke, Ben ja Wes lootusega leida armastust ning uks vallaline kaunitar hakkab kiiresti nendele kolme silma.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: David aitab lotoga miljoni võitnud paaril kolida pisikesest uurikorterist nende unistuste majja Washington DCs.

programme.title: Unelmate hotell
programme.desc: Markus suundub Malaisiasse, et toetada head sõbrannat Jenniferi. Viimane on hiljuti mehe kaotanud ja peab 7-aastase poja kasvatamise ja vaikese hotelli pidamisega uksi hakkama saama. Probleemid kasvavad naisel ule pea ja muuhulgas ahvardab teda kodust ilma jaamine. Teiste hulgas peatub hotellis kuulus pianist, kelle lahutusest kõik ajalehed kirjutavad. Mees loodab vaikselt varjupaika leida. Kõmuajakirjanik Sabine naeb aga võimalust oma kiiva kiskunud karjaar paasta.

programme.title: Armastuse hind
programme.desc: Seyran uritab siluda suhteid Sultaniga ja saab lahedasemaks Asumaniga. Feriti too aga palvib Necipi tahelepanu. Feriti suhtumine Seyranisse muutub, kui too teda esimese ehte eest kiidab. Asuman satub pealt kuulma Ifakati ettepanekut, kuidas Fuatist Asumani terviseprobleemidest hoolimata isa saaks. Seyran on Pelini haarberisse tungimisest vaga hairitud. Seyran saab teada, et Orhanil ja Ifakatil on salasuhe.

programme.title: Kodud rahaks
programme.desc: Legendaarse Mustamae korterite seas peitub uks tõeline teemant, mille lihvimise ulesande Keili ja Merlin korteriomanik Kailile annavad. Merlini ideed on seekord nii suurejoonelised, et panevad korteriomanikku nii mõnelgi korral tõsiselt kahtlema. Samas inspireerivad need teda ennastki ette võtma veel projekte, mis lõpptulemuse taiesti erakordseks muudavad.

programme.title: Sõbrad
programme.desc: Rachel nõustub olema pruutneitsi oma endise kihlatu pulmas.

programme.title: Õhtu!
programme.desc: Argiõhtute kõige mangulisem ja meeleolukam seltskond Piret Laos, Robert Rool ja Juri Butšakov toovad ekraanile varsked teemad, ullatuskulalised ja lõbusad mangud. "ÕHTU!" paneb toopaevale mõnusa punkti ja loob hea tuju.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud. Austraalia
programme.desc: Romantikust Davina kohtub lõbusa loomuga Anthonyga, et armastusele võimalust anda. Suhtlusappidest tudinenud Amy saadetakse kohtingule heasudamliku Ryaniga. Modelliambitsioonidega Shane laheb kohtama glamuuritar Jemmaga. Selgeltnagija Harry T. kohtub intuitiivse Ianiga. Kas on oodata sademeid või hoopis talentide põrkumist? Endine stjuuard Mathew loodab leida tudeng Nicoleist oma unistuste kaaslase.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: MacKenzie raagib hinge pealt kõik ara. Roo aimab ohtu. Kas Tane jõuab enne pulmi piisavalt ules sulada?

programme.title: Armastuse hind
programme.desc: Kazim on Istanbuli luksuskorterist vaimustatud. Ta soovib kohe Halisit naha, kuid peab pettuma, kui teda ei võeta Korhanite haarberis nii soojalt vastu, kui on lootnud. Samuti raagib Kazim Halisile Feriti haigusest, mida nii kiivalt Halisi eest saladuses hoiti. Ferit viib Seyrani tema pere juurde kulla. Suna saab teada põhjuse, miks Ferit valis tema asemel Seyrani ja ta hakkab juhtunus suudistama oma õde.

programme.title: Kodud rahaks
programme.desc: Saatejuht Keili Sukijainen ja sisustusentusiast Merlin Miido tõttavad Tallinnas Sikupilli asumis appi korteriomanik Kadrile, kes unistab oma kodu valja uurimisest, sest tahab saada tõuke enesearenduseks. Korter on saanud korduvalt remonti tunda ja juba paris heas korras. See annab võimaluse katsetada eriti julgeid lahendusi, et valmiks kodu, mis iga luhiajalise peatuja pilku hetkega puuaks.

programme.title: Valvsa pilgu all
programme.desc: Elena nuhib Tory korteris, mis viib ootamatu avastuseni salajases toas. Elena on endast valjas, kui saab ootamatu kõne oma minevikust.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus

programme.title: Vallalised lembelaeval
programme.desc: Saabume Kusadasi sadamasse. Parast dramaatilisi sundmusi eelmisel õhtul hoiavad vallalised silma peal auhinnal - tõelisel armastusel. Aga kas nad leiavad oma õnne?

programme.title: Valelikud võrgutajad
programme.desc: Aria ja Emily uhendavad jõud, et Sydney tausta uurida. Spencer saab lahedasemaks uurija Fureyga. Hanna mangukord osutub intensiivsemaks, kui ta oleks osanud ette aimata.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Maya naaseb saarele ja paiskab kogu senise elukorralduse pea peale.

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Kertu ja Mari raagivad omavahel asjad selgeks. Urmas palub Piretilt oma kaitumise parast andestust. Sirje kasib Mammul Inna ees vabandada. Kertu kohtub Andrese teadmata Erikuga. Piret kusib emalt Voltsi suhtes nõu. Indrekul on Lauri suhtes kahtlusi.

programme.desc: Julieta ei taha uurimist lõpetada. Irene pettub toointervjuus. Elsa lahkub kulast.

programme.title: Lotovõitja unistuste kodu
programme.desc: Lotoga miljoni võitnud California paar asub endale võiduraha eest otsima unistuste suvilat Mehhikosse San Felipesse. David aitab neid raskete valikute langetamisel.

programme.title: Unelmate hotell
programme.desc: Markus kulastab Maldiive, kus tema tutar Leonie hotelli juhib. Mees loodab puhata ja lõõgastuda, kuid ta leiab eest 20 aasta taguse armastatu Eva, kellel on kaasas tutar Nikola. Mured on ka Dusseldorfi arimehel Alexandril, kelle pagas on Berliini bioloogi Sandraga vahetusse lainud. Mõistagi tuleb ootamatusi ette veel rohkesti.

programme.title: Esmakohtingud. Austraalia
programme.desc: Tantsija Kelsey loodab leida merejalavaelases Danielis endale kaaslast. Hiljuti suure kaalulanguse labi teinud Chris kohtub Jessicaga, kellel on villand sõbratsoonist. Soakas Shaz laheb kohtingule mustkunstnik Michaeliga. Stephanie, kellel on netisuhtlusest mõõt tais, kohtub teravmeelse Coliniga ja romantikust laulja Ally loodab leida ragbimangijas Joshis inspiratsiooni uueks lauluks.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Sonny on valmis oma võlga tasuma. Kirby saab hea uudise. Eliza kaotab enesevalitsuse.

programme.title: Armastuse hind
programme.desc: Feritile laheb ilma loata Seyrani tema pere juurde viimine kalliks maksma. Ferit saab Halisilt kõva peapesu ja põgeneb Pelini juurde. Seyran hoolitseb Feriti eest, kui too oosel purjus koju saabub. Asumanile tehakse operatsioon. Seyranit tabab kohutav ullatus, kui Yusuf koputab haarberi uksele. Ferit aitab Seyrani hadast valja. Seyran on Feritiga aus ja raagib talle tema varasemast suhtest Yusufiga.

programme.title: Kodud rahaks
programme.desc: Tartus ootab Keili ja Merlini abi vaike korter vaga heade mõtete linnale iseloomulikus majas. Korteriomanik Evi on aastate jooksul siin ise hoolega remonti teinud, ikka vaikeste etappide kaupa ja tapselt nii palju kui hadavajalik. Armastus lillemustri ja tapeedi vastu on silmapaistev, kuid potentsiaalikas palksein annab lootust, et kaks nadalat ja 1000 eurot hiljem saab korterist tanapaevane, kuid rustikaalse hõnguga hubane kodu unistavale tudengile.

programme.title: Valvsa pilgu all
programme.desc: Elena muutub paranoiliseks, kartes, et teda jalgitakse pidevalt; Ginny ja Elenasõbrunevad Allie kappi koristades; Elena seisab silmitsi oma minevikuga.

programme.title: Alasti ahvatlus

programme.desc: Kui maabume varvilises Istanbuli linnas, pannakse uued paarid proovile. Kas vastastikused tunded puhkevad õitsele või lahkub laevalt uksildane suda?

programme.title: Valelikud võrgutajad
programme.desc: Ali kord on mangida ja ootamatult seisab ta uliolulise isikliku kusimuse ees. Hanna ja Spencer kohtavad vana tuttavat, kes varjab šokeerivat saladust.

programme.title: Armastuse saar
programme.desc: Saarel mangitakse paarid taas ringi ja uks saareline peab langetama raske valiku.

programme.title: Majajahtijad
programme.desc: Varskelt abiellunud Alan ja Lucy armastavad Chicagot, aga mitte oma tillukest korterit ja nii on nad aarelinna maja jahil. Nende arusaam taiuslikust majast on aga usna erinev, kas nad leiavad midagi, mis tundub mõlemale nagu kodu?

programme.title: Pilvede all
programme.desc: Erik raagib Andresele kohtumistest Kertuga. Sirje ahvardab Gunnarit ja laheb sellega ule piiri. Kertu suudistab Piretit reetmises. Inna soovitab Urmasel Haapsallu jaada. Riina on Laurist sisse võetud, kuid mees huvitub ka Marist. Piret veedab aega Mammuga.

programme.title: Vana silla saladus
programme.desc: Antolina manipuleerib Isaaciga. Fernando uritab Maríat ules leida. Dolores otsib meeleheitlikult Tiburciot.

programme.title: Laskur
programme.desc: Harrise abiga õnnestub Bob Leel viimaks Earli surma eest katte maksta. Nadine ja Isaac puuavad Atlase vange enda heaks tegutsema meelitada. Julie proovib, milline on elu ilma Bob Leeta.

programme.title: Reporter
programme.desc: Kell on saanud seitse ja on aeg paeva kõige tahtsamateks uudisteks meilt ning mujalt maailmast. Kaadrid sundmuse keskel, intervjuud otsustajatelt ja lood, mis kõnetavad kõiki. "Reporter" on alati kohal seal, kus elu kaib, ning raagib asjadest otse ja jõuliselt. Saatejuhid on Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.desc: Josh Gates saadab Jessica Choboti ja Phil Torrese Tennesseesse, et nad selgitakse valja tõe verdtarretava Belli nõia legendi osas, sest kohalike sõnul on 19. sajandi alguses tegutsenud nõid naasnud.

programme.title: Kood 211
programme.desc: Patrullpolitseiniku Mike Chandleri, tema paarimehe ja nende toovarju tavaline toopaev võtab ootamatu poorde, kui nad satuvad peale pangaroovile, mille viivad labi kõrgelt koolitatud ja tugevalt relvastatud endised palgasõdurid.

programme.desc: Josh Gates saadab Jessica Choboti ja Phil Torrese Tennesseesse, et nad selgitakse valja tõe verdtarretava Belli nõia legendi osas, sest kohalike sõnul on 19. sajandi alguses tegutsenud nõid naasnud.

programme.title: Jalg

Reporter Heidi Hanso õpib Eesti ainsas metsamuuseumis tegema vahet põdral ja kopral.

programme.desc: Alile meeldib Lukei poissmehekorter nii vaga, et ta ahvardab ooseks mitte koju ilmuda. See tekitab Pegiga suure tuli.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Marcy naeb õudusunenagusid Alist ja naabrite elu muutub maapealseks põrguks, sest need õudsed unenaod on nimelt seksuaalfantaasiad.

programme.title: Tapja motiiv
programme.desc: Kui Californias kaob ilus kahe vaikese lapsega perekond, arvab politsei, et nad tegid seda vabatahtlikult. Kulub kumme aastat, enne kui ilmneb kohutav tõde: kõigi silme all elanud mõrvar tappis terve pere.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Susan Cummings on miljardarist relvaarimehe tutar ja parija. Roberto Villegas on kuulus Argentina polomangija. Nende saatused ristuvad 140-hektarilistes maavaldustes ja eluga paaseb vaid uks neist.

Ehk olete kunagi mõelnud, miks peaks oma autol bensiini asemel hoopiski gaasikutust kasutama? Jalg avab tana just neid teemasid.

programme.title: Tapja motiiv
programme.desc: Kui California kõrbelinna tolmusel tanaval tapetakse sõdur, paneb politseiuurimine proovile sõprussidemed ja perekondliku lojaalsuse piirid.

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Tupac Shakur oli teerajajast poeet ja muusikatoostuse fenomen, kes lasti maha, kui ta oli vaid 25. Tema surm oli jaanud mõistatuseks, kuni uurijad leiavad uue, hairiva juhtlõnga.

programme.title: Esimesed 48 tundi
programme.desc: Suutu mees tapetakse parast linna peal veedetud ood. Politsei juhtlõngad ei paista kuhugi valja viivat, kuid siis tuleb ilmsiks taiesti ootamatu ajend.

programme.title: Mõistatustekutid
programme.desc: Josh Gates saadab Jessica Choboti ja Phil Torrese New Jerseysse jahtima kurikuulsat Jersey kuradit. Kohalikud on mures deemoni parast, kes on neid ahistanud juba ule 300 aasta.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Walker kaitseb sõdurit, kes on otsustanud katte maksta maffiabossile, kes tappis noore sõdurpoisi õe.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Walker tabab ohtliku kurjategija, keda kutsutakse Jaameheks. Et katte saada Jaamehe abilisi, kutsub korravalvur appi oma sõbra, kes on Jaamehega aravahetamiseni sarnane.

programme.title: Walker, Texase korravalvur
programme.desc: Texase korravalvurid rundavad uimastilaborit, kuid uimastiarikate asemel leiavad nad eest vaikese poisi, kelle narkomaanist ema on maha jatnud.

programme.title: Tapja motiiv
programme.desc: Julge jutuga raadiosaate juht ja veteranide eestkõneleja lastakse tema enda magamistoas maha. Kas tema soakad arvamused tegid temast sihtmargi või viis tema mõrvani perekonnasaladuste litaania?

programme.title: Vanity Fairi saladused
programme.desc: Kui sureb mae otsas olevate paratusuurte maavalduste omanik, poorduvad kogu Virginia Orangei maakonna pilgud ta kena teise abikaasa poole, kes kunagi oli tema esimese abikaasa põetaja olnud. Kas tema tappis mehe, kellele kunagi lohutust oli pakkunud?

programme.title: Esimesed 48 tundi
programme.desc: Suutu mees tapetakse parast linna peal veedetud ood. Politsei juhtlõngad ei paista kuhugi valja viivat, kuid siis tuleb ilmsiks taiesti ootamatu ajend.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Bundyde perekond sõidab puhkusele ning mis võiks olla parem ja odavam paik kui kahtlase kuulsusega motell.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Bundyde puhkusele teeb lõpu motellis ringi hiiliv kirvega mõrtsukas, kes Pegi roovib. Kuid kas Al viitsib teda paasta?

programme.title: Harley Quinn
programme.desc: Kas oled kuulnud lugu võmmist, laululinnust, hullust ja maffiaprintsessist? See on lugu, mida jutustab Harley ise ainult temale omasel moel. Kui Gothami kuratlikem nartsissistlik pahalane Roman Sionis ja ta fanaatiline parem kasi Zsasz võtavad sihikule Cassi-nimelise noore neiu, asub kogu linn tudrukut otsima. Harley, Kuti, Musta Kanaarilinnu ja Renee Montoya teed ristuvad ning ebatõenaoline nelik peab uheskoos Romanist jagu saama.

programme.title: Esimesed 48 tundi
programme.desc: Kui tapetakse endine lasteaiaõpetaja, on politseiuurijatel juhtumi lahendamisel vaja tunnistaja abi.

programme.title: Laskur
programme.desc: Bob Leel on raske tulla korraga toime oma eesmargiga Atlasele lõpp teha ja oma peresuhete paastmisega. Isaac, Nadine ja Harris saavad kõik DC-s uued rollid.

programme.title: Reporter
programme.desc: Kell on saanud seitse ja on aeg paeva kõige tahtsamateks uudisteks meilt ning mujalt maailmast. Kaadrid sundmuse keskel, intervjuud otsustajatelt ja lood, mis kõnetavad kõiki. "Reporter" on alati kohal seal, kus elu kaib, ning raagib asjadest otse ja jõuliselt. Saatejuhid on Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Jalg
programme.desc: Hooaja viimases saates laheme vaga vaikeste osakeste maailma, et naha, kuidas on põlevkivi seotud juuste varvimisega ja mis peitub uhke mõiste "peenkeemia" taga. Keskkonnasaastu jalgedesse jõuame siis, kui jutuks tuleb laevade umber ehitamine keskkonnasõbralikumate kutteviiside peale. Seda, kuidas taastuvatest allikatest energiat uldse katte saada, on aga hea mõista siis, kui naeme, kuidas tootab tuulegeneraator.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Michaelil võib avaneda võimalus tootada New Yorgis peakontoris. Kuna ta arvab, et edutamine on kindel, asub Michael endale asendajat otsima, teadmata, et samale kohale kandideerivad ka Jim ja Karen.

programme.title: 30 Rock

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Charliel tekib ootamatu probleem impotentsusega. Jake kusib Alanilt nõu tudruku osas, kellele ta koolis meeldib.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Charlie tahistab Rosei sunnipaeva, joob end tais ja leiab end temaga kompromiteerivast olukorrast. Rosei isa nõuab seepeale, et Charlie oma kavatsused teatavaks teeks.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Al muub Chicago Bearsis mangimiseks oma hinge kuradile ja avastab, et põrgu on paris vahva paik.

programme.title: Tuvikesed
programme.desc: Bundyd ja Darcyd võetakse pantvangiks, kui Budiga kirjavahetust pidanud endine vang trellide tagant vabaneb.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Michael otsustab Janile vastu hakata, kuid muudab otsekohe meelt. Michael, Jim ja Karen sõidavad New Yorki peakontori tookoha vestlusele.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Michael saab teada, et tema uus tookoht on seotud Jani vallandamisega. Jimi toovestlus laheb hasti, kuid ta pole kindel, kas suudab Pami maha jatta.

programme.title: Minu nimi on Earl
programme.desc: Randy avastab, et nimekirjapunktide taitmine parandab Earli seisundit. Esimene valitud ulesanne - varastatud mootorratta tagastamine - toob valja hirmsa malestuse Earli ja Randy minevikust.

programme.title: Minu nimi on Earl
programme.desc: Jargmine ulesanne Earli nimekirjas puudutab vanemate puhkuse rikkumist ja marihuaanat tais spordikotti.

programme.title: Bioloogia kursus
programme.desc: Jack kasutab Lynetteile mulje avaldamiseks Michellei iga-aastast mõrvamusteeriumipidu. Meeleheitel õpilased tungivad Whitlocki keskkooli, et varastada A.P. Bio eksamimaterjalid.

programme.title: Bioloogia kursus
programme.desc: Jacki sõda naabriga jõuab poordepunkti, kui see ahvardab rikkuda kohtingu Lynetteiga. Kui koolifotograaf oma hinda tõstab, võtab Durbin koolipiltide tegemise enda katte.

programme.title: Kõik armastavad Raymondit
programme.desc: Parast tuli Frankiga tuleb Marie Raymondi ja Debra juurde oobima. Frank naudib seda, et maja on tema paralt ning Raymond laseb oma emal end poputada.

programme.title: Kõik armastavad Raymondit
programme.desc: Debra vanemad kutsuvad kõik Baroneid õhtusoogile peenes restoranis. Seal teeb Raymond aga kohatu kommentaari, mis viib ta pahuksisse mõlema perega.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Michael ajab buroo parklas Meredithi alla ja arstlikul kontrollil selgub, et Meredithil on marutaud. Angela palub Dwightil oma haiget kassi hoida, aga Dwight valib looma halastussurma tee.

programme.title: Kontor
programme.desc: Michael korraldab Meredithile marutaudi heategevusjooksu, kuid keegi pole asjast vaimustuses. Michaelil endal on tukk tegemist, et finishisse jõuda.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Kui Charlie saab korvi kena balletiõpetaja Mia kaest, puuab ta siiski Alanit veenda, et suudab Mia kohtama meelitada. Charlie suudab Jakei balletti õppima panna, kuid poiss armub ka ise Miasse.

programme.title: Kaks ja pool meest
programme.desc: Alani vastu tekib romantiline huvi rikkal vanemal daamil. Kuid Alan kahtleb, kas see on ikka tema jaoks midagi õiget.

programme.title: Sõbrad
programme.desc: Monica ja Chandler hakkavad otsima meeskandidaate, kes võiksid Monica viljastada. Phoebe kohtub uhel peol oma mõlema endise kutiga.

programme.title: Sõbrad
programme.desc: Chandler annab Davidile nõu, mis sunnib teda Phoebele abieluettepanekut tegema, kuid Phoebe armastab veel Mikei, kes ilmubki Barbadosele ja rikub Davidi abieluettepaneku ara. Rachel mõtleb, kuidas Joeyle oelda, et on temast sisse võetud.

programme.title: Minu nimi on Earl
programme.desc: Earl on endiselt koomas, kuid saab haiglast valja. Randy leiab viisi, kuidas aidata Earli nimekirjas olevat punkti taita, aidates parapleegikutest õde-venda.

programme.title: Minu nimi on Earl
programme.desc: Kui Earl arkab koomast, otsustab ta leida ules oma tõelise armastuse Billie. Kuid teda on keeruline leida ja Billiel on rohkem kui uks kosilane.

programme.title: Marlow mõrvaklubi
programme.desc: Pensionil arheoloogist, vikaari naisest ja kohalikust koerajalutajast saavad ootamatult sõbrad ja amatoordetektiivid, kes jooksevad ajaga võidu, et peatada nende linnas tegutsev sarimõrvar.

programme.title: Murdochi musteeriumid
programme.desc: Kui Crabtree ja Effie osalevad Charles Dickensi sunni tahistamisel, saab võõrustaja mustilisel kombel surma.

programme.title: Murdochi musteeriumid
programme.desc: Murdoch, Watts ja Choi uurivad uues tootajate elurajoonis elanud raamatupidaja surma, mille põhjustas kokaiini uledoos.

programme.title: Perekond Hardacre
programme.desc: See on vaesest rikkaks saamise lugu, mis jalgib toolisklassi kuuluva Hardacrei perekonna elu, armusuhteid ja õnnestumisi 1890ndate Yorkshireis.

programme.title: Preili Scarlet ja Hertsog
programme.desc: Elizal on võimalus teenida tasu, mis võiks muuta ta elu, kui ta pakub abi sissenõudmata varanduse parijale; ta vajab hertsogi abi, kuid paljastus tema kohta muudab koostoo võimatuks.

programme.title: Suured loomad, vaiksed loomad
programme.desc: James ja Helen hoiavad saladust, Carmody ees on valjakutse parast Crabtree farmi kulastust õppida, kuidas olla loomaarst ja uutel talunikel on karjas murettekitav haigus.

programme.title: Suured loomad, vaiksed loomad
programme.desc: James on asumas uuele teekonnale; ta tahab, et asjad oleksid korras ja Carmody valja õpetatud Siegfriedi toetama, kuid tema plaanid veavad viltu, kui kliinikusse tuuakse vigastatud kass.

programme.title: Miss Fisheri mõrvalood
programme.desc: 1964: kui Peregrine Fisheri tundmatu tadi jaab kadunuks, parib naine sullekukkunud varanduse ja peab tõestama, et tal on piisavalt nutti, et saada maailmatasemel eradetektiiviks.

programme.title: Murdochi musteeriumid
programme.desc: Kui Murdoch uurib Sigmund Freudi kolleegi salaparast surma, saab ta ootamatu psuhhoanaluusi.

programme.title: D´Urbervilles‘ suguvõsa Tess
programme.desc: Tess naaseb segaduses ja habis koju tagasi parast seda, kui tema manipuleeriv "nõbu" Alec DUrberville teda ara võrgutas. Ta leiab tood piimafarmis, kus ta kohtub taas nagusa Angel Clareiga.

programme.title: Sissi
programme.desc: Sissi ja Rudolf naudivad vaba elu saarel. Sissi saab tagasi elurõõmu. Franz heitleb valispoliitikaga, kuna Bismarck ja Vene tsaar plaanivad liitu. Ta palub abi oma emalt. Grunne mõistab jarjest rohkem tooliste muresid ega teata Franzile, et need on keisri sõduritelt relvi varastanud. Ballil markab Franz salaparast krahvinnat, keda Walli kehastab, nii lõpeb koos Gustaviga kavandatud roovretk naisele hoopis ullatavalt.

programme.title: Sissi
programme.desc: Franz on saanud teada, kus ta naine ja poeg viibivad ning sõidab nende juurde Prantsusmaale. Sissi ja Franz veedavad koos kirgliku oo, kuid hommikul selgub, et keiser on salaja poja tagasi Viini sõjakooli viinud. Grunne lojaalsus keisri vastu saab viimase hoobi, nahes, kui julmalt koheldakse massumeelseid toolisi. Ertshertsoginna Sophiel õnnestub veenda Vene tsaari Viini reisima, arutamaks keisriga rahuliidu sõlmimist. Franz jõuab arusaamale, et sõjakool pole Rudolfi jaoks õige koht.

programme.title: Marlow mõrvaklubi
programme.desc: Pensionil arheoloogist, vikaari naisest ja kohalikust koerajalutajast saavad ootamatult sõbrad ja amatoordetektiivid, kes jooksevad ajaga võidu, et peatada nende linnas tegutsev sarimõrvar.
